explanation: The program printed the Python list object directly (print(res)), which outputs brackets and commas. The problem requires space-separated week sums. I fixed the final line to unpack the list so the numbers are printed separated by spaces (print(*res)). None of the retrieved diffs directly applied to this fix.
fixed_code:
N = int(input())
A = list(map(int,input().split()))

res = [0]*N
SUM = 0
for i in range(len(A)):
    SUM += A[i]
    if (i + 1)%7==0:
        res[i//7] = SUM
        SUM = 0

print(*res)
